name: Crocodile Chase Simulator
description:
This giant lizard is coming out to play. Here comes the wild african Crocodile. Take him hunting for wild animals and defend your territory against other Scorpions, Elephant, Rhino, Snake, and Wild Boar. This animal simulator has been designed for all ages.

Features:
--Huge Swamp Map
--9 African Swamp Animals included
--4 Different Times of Day, plus rain
--Upgrade your Crocodile Strength, Stamina, Speed, and Speed
--BONUS Adventures, 12 in Total
--6 BONUS Battles for 3-on-1 match ups
DYNAMIC GAME PLAY
No two games will ever be the same. You will experience unique animal encounters every time you play this sim.
UPGRADE YOUR CROC
When you hunt, you will earn meat units. These meat units can be used to purchase upgrades for your Crocodile.
AUTOMATICALLY RECORD YOUR SUCCESS
A special feature in the app allows you to keep track of your hunting success.
HEAD TO HEAD BATTLE SCENARIOS
Challenge your fighting skills against 6 different 3 on 1 battles. Be prepared for a flight for survival. You either win or loose.
9 SWAMP ANIMALS INCLUDED
Hunt down african animals like Rhino, Lion, Elephant, Zebra, and Hippos.
3D GAMEPLAY
Addictive and fun controls for hours of fun.
This croc animal simulator has been designed with all ages in mind.
